mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ICT_RECIPE ( RNUM, RSUBJECT, RCONTENT, RPHOTO, RJERYO, RTIME, RPERSON, RDIFF, RCATEGORY, WARNING, MNUM, RHIT, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{ rnum }, #{ rsubject }, #{ rcontent }, #{ rphoto }, #{ rjeryo }, #{ rtime }, #{ rperson }, #{ rdiff }, #{ rcategory }, #{ warning }, #{ mnum }, 0, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
